DOC.brief_summary: This study will assess the inter-center reproducibility and accuracy of hepatic fat fraction measurements using up to two MRI-based methods. The intra-class correlation coefficient (ICC) for the repeated measurements is expected to be greater than 0.6.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) to Quantify Liver Fat in Diabetic and Pre-Diabetic Patients (0000-171)
